content: There was once a girl who trod on a loaf to avoid soiling her shoes, and the misfortunes that happened to her in consequence are well known.
translations: ita:C'era una volta una ragazza che calpest√≤ una pagnotta per evitare di sporcare le scarpe, e le disgrazie che le successer
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
